post:
![](https://sinavps.ch/logo/sinavps-logo.png)

Hello

I’d like to announce our new webhosting company named SinaVPS. Our company was founded in Switzerland in September 2014. All of our products are located in Switzerland. We are RIPE member and have or own IP addresses.

Here are our offers:

**Sina VZ S**

   * 1 CPU Core
   * 256MB RAM
   * 10GB Harddisk
   * UNMETERED BANDWITH
   * 1 IPv4 address
   * 1 IPv6 address (more if requested)
   * 3 CHF per month (~$3.12)
 
Order link: [https://my.sinavps.ch/cart.php?a=add&pid=43](https://my.sinavps.ch/cart.php?a=add&pid=43)

**Sina VZ M**

   * 1 CPU Core
   * 512MB RAM
   * 15GB Harddisk
   * UNMETERED BANDWITH
   * 1 IPv4 address
   * 1 IPv6 address (more if requested)
   * 6 CHF per month (~$6.23)
 

Order link: [https://my.sinavps.ch/cart.php?a=add&pid=44](https://my.sinavps.ch/cart.php?a=add&pid=44)

Looking Glass: [http://lg.zug.sinavps.ch/](http://lg.zug.sinavps.ch/)

Testfiles:

100MB: [http://lg.zug.sinavps.ch/100MB.test](https://my.sinavps.ch/cart.php?a=add&pid=44)

1024MB: [http://lg.zug.sinavps.ch/1024MB.test](http://lg.zug.sinavps.ch/1024MB.test)


Additional IPv4 addresses: 1 CHF per IP and month

You can pay with credit card or bank transfer if you have a SEPA bank account.


More of our offers at [http://sinavps.ch/en/](http://sinavps.ch/en/)
